EmailTemplate.name: Post-Class Follow-up Sales Mgmt
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-up to Effective Sales Management Using Salesforce.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for attending Effective Sales Management Using Salesforce.com. The purpose of this email is to provide you with the documents reviewed during training, instructions on how to complete your Application Assessment (Test) and guidance on the next steps in your training roadmap.
Several links are provided below. In order to download the appropriate document, or complete the appropriate assessment, please click on the link or copy/paste it into your browser.
Links to the presentations reviewed during your classroom training session can be found below:
□ Reinforcing the Fundamentals (Tuesday morning)
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bxpBXYhsLZ47LSXOrKN2tbgVIRws=
□ Salesforce Mobile and Salesforce.com Roadmap (Tuesday afternoon)
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bvBjKka7pr.X8Aje7Vk4bjRJyDKA=
□ Managing Performance & Managing Change (Wednesday morning)
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1btpPyyhIkyDMmNdKxUpd8lSGLvQY=
The feedback you provided during this session was used to finalize the presentation materials for Effective Selling with Salesforce.com, our Account Manager classroom training session. As such, we have created the following “cheat-sheet” for you and your Account Managers:
https://na1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/30000000lp1bb47Hvo6UjffIA0ErUUwMauIfd10=
As we continue to learn together, it is important that we assess the skills which each trainee has developed. Please take 15 minutes to complete this Application Assessment regarding the materials covered in your Training Roadmap up to, and including your classroom training session:
http://hslearning.intra.sears.com/HSL/Training/Salesforce-Training.aspx (select course 3071)
Looking ahead, please be aware of and ready for the following:
□ Sales Management Training Roadmap
o Classroom training debrief to be scheduled for the week of 8/16
□ Account Manager Training Roadmap
o Data Accuracy Review to be complete by 8/6
o Application Assessment to be complete within 1 week of classroom training
o Classroom district debriefs to occur within 2 weeks of classroom training (DM led)
o Regional district debriefs to occur within 3 weeks of classroom training (Implementation team led)
Thank you for having the courage to change your habits and the leadership to help your teams as they change.
Best,
{!User.FirstName}
